attributes.action: require british nationals to have both parents born in the UK to be eligible to apply for a marriage visa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Office says "there are sometimes situations in which a young person is forced by family pressure into an unwanted union," with one party needing a visa to enter the UK.  This policy would help brake the cycle of forced marriages to foreign nationals.
